title: Data Aide (FWS Eligible) Student Worker III
duties_responsibilities: Work under supervision with manager regarding content of CDC database
Transferring of information from one data source to another
Identifying and correcting data entry errors
Assist with other duties as assigned
required_qualifications: A significant amount of specialized training or experience
Interest in criminal justice and/or public health research
Prior experience in data collection, cleaning, and reporting for research projects
Prior experience with data coding, abstraction, or summarization
Prior experience using the AZ-VDRS, SUDORS, or other CDC systems
Prior experience handling sensitive information or data
Prior experience working at or volunteering with a police agency or medical examiner’s office
Prior experience working or volunteering in a criminology or death investigation context
Proficiency in Microsoft Word, Excel, Google Docs, Google Sheets
CCJ students are encouraged to apply
Must be able to pass a background check to work at the Center
preferred_qualifications: Federal Work-Study eligibility is preferred but not required
